translations: 成漏斗形；汇集（funnel 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: That inflation is funneling into US goods prices as well.
sentences.translation: 通货膨胀同样也注入美国的物价中。

sentences.sentence: I'll be funneling some of this extra time into other tasks and projects.
sentences.translation: 所以我现在开始把很多时间都用在了新的项目上。

sentences.sentence: By funneling all messages through Messenger, it will be easier to support different interfaces.
sentences.translation: 通过将所有消息经过Messenger传输，支持不同界面就容易了。
